name: My Sweet Ants!
description:
General


My Sweet Ants! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Ants

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of levels with ants art in HD quality.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

Features

  • Several difficulty levels.
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • 5 HD quality art with beautiful ants
  • Pleasant atmosphere.

Game Modes:


  • EASY - 4x4
  • MEDIUM - 4x6
  • ADVANCED - 6x10
  • HARD - 8x14
  • EPIC- 10x16
